item.title: Build EiskaltDC++ on Fedora 15 Lovelock 64-bit
item.description: EiskaltDC++ is a cross-platform program that uses the Direct Connect and ADC protocol. The direct connect client LinuxDC++ available in rpmfusion repos doesn’t yet support ADC protocol and hence doesn’t work with the DC++ Hub that has been setup in our hostel. I had to compile Eiskalt from the sources. Posting here the steps I had to follow for a rather painful build. I am using Fedora 15 64-bit with GNOME 3 desktop.
